column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////My aunt and uncle adore this place
column2: they come several times a month! This is the first time I ate in and thoroughly enjoyed myself. Multiple servers were available to help us and would check in periodically. I had the salmon
column3: which was great although it could use more oomf in the sauce. More muted flavors but appreciated all the veggies included. The Brussels sprouts were delicious even if you had a piece that wasn't covered in yummy cheese. Not to mention the whiskey
column4: I couldn't talk enough about that. Will happily return every time my family does!
